caption.p: (Color online) (A) DOS comparison for the oxygen monovacancy on anatase (101) by using AE–LCAO (HSE) with four and five trilayers (B) Band gap for the oxygen monovacancy on anatase (101) by using AE–LCAO (HSE) with BS2 and BS3. (C) Band gap for an hydrogen adsorption and oxygen monovacancy on anatase (101) by using AE–LCAO (HSE) with BS3.
